articles.title: Ohio State, Indiana clash for Big Ten crown in rare title game featuring nation’s top-ranked teams - CNN
articles.description: For the first time in more than a decade and just the third time since conference championship games were standardized, the nation’s top-ranked teams - Ohio State and Indiana - will play for a title.
articles.content:
Indiana coach Curt Cignetti has been here before. Twice.
His second-ranked Hoosiers, just like first-ranked Ohio State, have not.
For the first time in more than a decade and just the third time si… [+4691 chars]

articles.author: Thomas Beaumont, Isabella Volmert
articles.title: Threats pile up as Indiana Republicans confront pressure from Trump on redistricting - AP News
articles.description: Republicans in the Indiana Senate are facing threats as President Trump pushes for lawmakers to redraw the state's congressional map. Trump's goal is to expand his party's power in the 2026 midterm elections. Redistricting is usually done once a decade, but T…
articles.content:
